pkgmetadata.longdescription: General Unified Threshold Model of Survival for Bees using Bayesian Inference // Tools to calibrate, validate, and make predictions with the General Unified Threshold model of Survival adapted for Bee species. The model is presented in the publication from Baas, J., Goussen, B., Miles, M., Preuss, T.G., Roessing, I. (2022) doi:10.1002/etc.5423 and is based on the GUTS framework Jager, T., Albert, C., Preuss, T.G. and Ashauer, R. (2011) doi:10.1021/es103092a. The authors are grateful to Bayer A.G. for its financial support.
